text: (eninum), kuhpaniyin mamicankalo, avarrin utirankalo allahvai oru potum ataivatillai anal unkalutaiya takva (payapakti) tan avanai ataiyum; allah unkalukku nervali kanpittatarkaka avanai ninkal perumaip patuttum poruttu ivvaraka avarrai unkalukku vacappatuttik kotuttirukkiran; akave nanmai ceyvorukku nir nanmarayan kuruviraka
